title: PRIVATE BEDROOM WITH SHARED BATHROOM IN A 7 BEDROOM 3 BATH APARTMENT *
posting_body: :PRIVATE BEDROOM WITH SHARED BATHROOM IN A 7 BEDROOM 3 BATH APARTMENT OPENED UP AND I'M LOOKING FOR A ROOMMATE {{TEXT:: VIA EMAIL}} THE APARTMENT IS LOCATED 1 MINUTE OFF THE FREEWAY IN MIRA MESA OFF OF CARROLL CANYON ROAD, SURROUNDED BY SEVERAL SHOPPING MALLS, GROCERY STORES, AND RESTAURANTS.
ONLY A 15 MINUTE DRIVE FROM NORTH PARK AND LESS THAN 20 MINUTES FROM THE BEACHES.
THE APARTMENT HAS A PORCH AND YOU'D BE RECEIVING YOUR OWN PARKING PERMIT TO HAVE A SECURED SPOT.
YOUR ROOM HAS SHARED BATHROOM AND 2 SPACIOUS STORAGE CLOSETS.
IT IS A MINIMUM SIX MONTH LEASE WITH A CREDIT CHECK AND AN APPLICATION.
MINIMUM OF A 6 MONTH COMMITMENT REQUIRED AND A 30 DAY NOTICE BEFORE VACATING.
MOVE IN DATE WOULD BE AUGUST.
IF YOU WANT TO VIEW THE PROPERTY YOU CAN PUT THE ADDRESS INTO GOOGLE AND THERE WILL BE A LINK WITH OLD PICTURES OF THIS HOME.
THESE ARE VERY OLD PICTURES, BUT IT WILL GIVE YOU A FEEL FOR THE LAYOUT OF THE HOME.
THE HOUSE HAS BRAND NEW FURNITURE AND HAS BEEN MODERNIZED.

LIVING-ROOM & DINING ROOM: 65" HD TV/ELEGANT GLASS TABLES/DECORATIVE/FURNISHINGS, CLUB HOUSE; WORK-OUT FACILITY, IN-GROUND POOL W/LOUNGE CHAIRS, OUTDOOR GRILLS, MUST BE A PROFESSIONAL WORKER, AVAILABLE FOR RENT WITH GOOD CREDIT OF 600+ AND ABOVE, LOOKING FOR SOMEONE BETWEEN, VACCINATED AND BOOSTED, WORK FROM HOME AND GENERALLY

SOMEONE WHO LIKES TO SPEND MORE TIME IN THE HOME, DOESN'T BRING THE PARTY HOME AND IN GENERAL DOESN'T HAVE VISITORS OFTEN AS I DON'T EITHER, 420 FRIENDLY, NO PETS PLEASE (OKAY WITH KEEPING YOUR ROOM DOOR CLOSED TO AVOID HER GETTING INTO ANYTHING IN YOUR ROOM TO ENSURE YOUR BELONGINGS ARE INTACT AND FOR HER OWN SAFETY SINCE SHE'S A BEAGLE AND WILL GET INTO THINGS).
ANY QUESTIONS - LEAVE YOUR NAME AND NUMBER AND BEST TIME TO CALL.
IF YOU WANT TO SCHEDULE A TIME TO VIEW THE PROPERTY, FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME.'''''SINCERELY''''
